about.title: About
about.intro: I'm a developer and designer focused on creating clean, functional, and beautiful digital products. With over 5 years of experience, I specialize in modern web technologies and user-centered design.
about.description: Currently working with React, Next.js, and TypeScript to build scalable applications that users love.
